participant_1.background:
My favorite people are my friends who I can drink coffee with and talk about anything.
I love a big bowl of chili after a long day of riding my bike.
I love working with my hands and getting to see the creative process through to completion.
i love cooking.
I have no need for a fortune teller; I know my future is bright.

i got a scholarship for playing soccer.
i am married with 2 children.
My family is always on the move, and we love to explore new places together.
i graduated college a few years ago.

content.text: Hey there, what do you like to do in your spare time?
I like watching TV, playing video games, and working on my gaming startup.
Gaming startup, that sounds interesting. What kind of games are you working on?
I'm working on a new multiplayer game that's a cross between PUBG and Fortnite.
Sounds cool, I'll have to check it out when it's finished.
Thanks, I appreciate that. What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to cook, ride my bike, and spend time with my friends.
I love to cook too, I'm always trying new recipes. I'm not much of a biker, but I do enjoy going for walks with my family.
Sounds like you have a busy life, but I'm sure you make time for the things that are important to you.
I try to, but it's not always easy. I'm grateful that my family is so supportive, and they help me to stay on track.
That's great to hear. It's important to have a support system, especially when you're working on something new.
I agree. My family is my everything
